sentences.en: a marked inhibition of cell growth
sentences.cn: 对细胞生长的显著抑制

sentences.en: BTH had no direct inhibition to the spore germination and mycelial growth.
sentences.cn: BTH对 炭疽菌孢子萌发及菌丝生长均无直接抑制作用.

sentences.en: Eugenol acidtannic acid showed over 40 % inhibition effect to soluble glucan.
sentences.cn: 对水不溶性葡聚糖和水溶性葡聚糖合成抑制的效果相对都比较好的是丁香酚、胡椒碱、茶多酚.
血球凝集抑制实验可能是实用的.

sentences.en: Inhibition of chlorophyll synthesis may be caused by etiolation, mutant blocks, or streptomycin.
sentences.cn: 叶绿素合成可以由黄化 、 突变性阻塞或链霉素而引起.

sentences.en: It is proved that the self - made antifungal agentantifungal effect , by the inhibition.
sentences.cn: 根据所报道的各种防霉剂特性,自配了针对变色移膜革的复合型防霉剂.

sentences.en: On most matters she's quite prepared to sound off without inhibition.
sentences.cn: 对大多数问题她都准备毫无保留地阐述自己的意见.

sentences.en: On the other hand, we have already seen that self - inhibition may be very marked.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 我们已经看到自阻聚是非常明显的.

sentences.en: People tend to lose their inhibitions when they’ve drunk a lot of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 人们在喝多了酒之后往往会无所顾忌。

sentences.en: Self - interest is no inhibition against accuracy.
sentences.cn: 自我 利益无损于分析的准确性.

sentences.en: She had no inhibitions about saying what she felt.
sentences.cn: 她毫不顾忌地说出自己的感觉。

sentences.en: Some drugs can cause the inhibition of normal bodily activity.
sentences.cn: 有些药剂会对正常的身体功能产生抑制作用.

sentences.en: The importance of synergistic effect on inhibition in acid solutions is summarized.
sentences.cn: 摘要概述了酸洗缓蚀协同的重要性.

sentences.en: The inhibition ratio, could be achieved more than 93 % by the 0.01 % pigment addition.
sentences.cn: 天然萝卜红色素的抗氧化能力与同浓度的BHT相近, 0.01%的添加量即可达到93%以上的抑制率.

sentences.en: The mechanism has been termed cumulative feedback inhibition.
sentences.cn: 这种机制就叫作累加反馈抑制.

sentences.en: They behave with a total lack of inhibition.
This biochemical inhibition of feeding by animals or plants is called " allelopathy ".
sentences.cn: 这一生物化学上抑制动物或植物的取食被称谓 “ 他感作用 ”.

sentences.en: Thus, inhibition of this mechanism could conceivably enhance the effect of norepinephrine.
sentences.cn: 因此可以想象, 抑制这种机制可以增强去甲肾上腺素的作用.

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 抑制剂，抗化剂；抑制者
[心理][电子][通信]抑制；压抑；禁止

trans.tran_en: when something is restricted or prevented from happening or developing
